name: Minted Marinated Zucchini
author: joannemerc
summary: For those who have mint leaves and zucchini taking over the vegetable patch, this is simple. This tangy dish can be used as a relish inside panini or sandwiches, or on the side.
ingredients: 2 cups fresh mint leaves, finely chopped
directions: Heat 1/4 cup of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add zucchini slices and garlic; cook and stir until starting to brown but you want the squash to stay firm and not get mushy, 3 to 4 minutes
Remove from the heat and mix in the vinegar, mint, salt and pepper
Stir in the remaining olive oil
Spoon into a jar and store covered in the refrigerator
